5f022a17-a35e-4d5b-8b56-8a03335ac6de.description: This badge: Indicates that World Education Services (WES) has evaluated the associated credential on behalf of the holder. Verifies the authenticity of the claimed credential. Provides assurance that the awarding institution and/or program was accredited at the point that the credential was issued Indicates that the associated credential has been assessed for its Canadian equivalency. Please see the evidence link below which is verification of only the credential with which it is associated.
5f022a17-a35e-4d5b-8b56-8a03335ac6de.name: Verified International Academic Qualifications

badge_template_activities.title: Has a WES credential evaluation report verifying the authenticity of the associated credential.
Graduated from an accredited program or institution.
Ensured that the proper documents were received by WES in the manner stipulated by WES.
Contracted with WES to store the verified documents and the evaluation report associated with the badge.

66fa13fe-323c-4a2c-b100-b82817e70c9f.description: This badge: Indicates that World Education Services (WES) has evaluated the associated credential on behalf of the holder. Verifies the authenticity of the claimed credential. Provides assurance that the awarding institution and/or program was accredited at the point that the credential was issued Indicates that the associated credential has been assessed for its U.S. equivalency. Please see the evidence link below which is verification of only the credential with which it is associated.
66fa13fe-323c-4a2c-b100-b82817e70c9f.name: Verified International Academic Qualifications
